title: Authors and Citation
text: Ryan Zomorrodi. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Zomorrodi R (2025). socratadata: Explore Socrata Data Ease. R package version 0.0.0.9005, https://ryanzomorrodi.github.io/socratadata/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {socratadata: Explore Socrata Data with Ease},   author = {Ryan Zomorrodi},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9005},   url = {https://ryanzomorrodi.github.io/socratadata/}, }

title: Explore Socrata Data with Ease
text: Explore Socrata data ease. socratadata provides easy--use interface downloading data Socrata open data portals powered Rust. socratadata improves upon existing RSocrata package introducing support Socrata Discovery API Socrata datatypes. Unlike RSocrata, socratadata support uploading editing existing datasets.

title: Explore Socrata Data with Ease
text: can install socratadata CRAN. can install development version socratadata GitHub :

title: Explore Socrata Data with Ease
text: Use soc_discover() explore datasets available Socrata data portal. even search category across many Socrata data portals.
code: library(socratadata)  chi_datasets <- soc_discover(   domains = "https://data.cityofchicago.org",   only = "dataset" ) print(chi_datasets) #> # A tibble: 879 × 21 #>    id    name  attribution owner_name provenance description created             #>    <chr> <chr> <chr>       <chr>      <chr>      <chr>       <dttm>              #>  1 xzkq… Curr… City of Ch… cocadmin   official   "This data… 2011-09-27 00:00:00 #>  2 ijzp… Crim… Chicago Po… cocadmin   official   "This data… 2011-09-30 00:00:00 #>  3 ydr8… Buil… City of Ch… cocadmin   official   "This data… 2011-09-30 00:00:00 #>  4 85ca… Traf… City of Ch… Jonathan … official   "Crash dat… 2017-10-19 00:00:00 #>  5 s6ha… Affo… City of Ch… cocadmin   official   "The renta… 2013-03-14 00:00:00 #>  6 4ijn… Food… City of Ch… cocadmin   official   "This info… 2011-08-08 00:00:00 #>  7 2ft4… Lobb… City of Ch… cocadmin   official   "All lobby… 2011-06-07 00:00:00 #>  8 i6bp… Chic… City of Ch… cocadmin   official   "List of a… 2010-12-22 00:00:00 #>  9 kn9c… Cens… U.S. Censu… Jamyia     official   "This data… 2012-01-05 00:00:00 #> 10 z8bn… Poli… Chicago Po… cocadmin   official   "Chicago P… 2010-12-22 00:00:00 #> # ℹ 869 more rows #> # ℹ 14 more variables: data_last_updated <dttm>, metadata_last_updated <dttm>, #> #   categories <list>, tags <list>, domain_category <chr>, domain_tags <list>, #> #   domain_metadata <list>, column_names <list>, column_labels <list>, #> #   column_datatypes <list>, column_descriptions <list>, permalink <chr>, #> #   link <chr>, license <chr> transportation_datasets <- soc_discover(   categories = "transportation",   only = "dataset" ) print(chi_datasets) #> # A tibble: 879 × 21 #>    id    name  attribution owner_name provenance description created             #>    <chr> <chr> <chr>       <chr>      <chr>      <chr>       <dttm>              #>  1 xzkq… Curr… City of Ch… cocadmin   official   "This data… 2011-09-27 00:00:00 #>  2 ijzp… Crim… Chicago Po… cocadmin   official   "This data… 2011-09-30 00:00:00 #>  3 ydr8… Buil… City of Ch… cocadmin   official   "This data… 2011-09-30 00:00:00 #>  4 85ca… Traf… City of Ch… Jonathan … official   "Crash dat… 2017-10-19 00:00:00 #>  5 s6ha… Affo… City of Ch… cocadmin   official   "The renta… 2013-03-14 00:00:00 #>  6 4ijn… Food… City of Ch… cocadmin   official   "This info… 2011-08-08 00:00:00 #>  7 2ft4… Lobb… City of Ch… cocadmin   official   "All lobby… 2011-06-07 00:00:00 #>  8 i6bp… Chic… City of Ch… cocadmin   official   "List of a… 2010-12-22 00:00:00 #>  9 kn9c… Cens… U.S. Censu… Jamyia     official   "This data… 2012-01-05 00:00:00 #> 10 z8bn… Poli… Chicago Po… cocadmin   official   "Chicago P… 2010-12-22 00:00:00 #> # ℹ 869 more rows #> # ℹ 14 more variables: data_last_updated <dttm>, metadata_last_updated <dttm>, #> #   categories <list>, tags <list>, domain_category <chr>, domain_tags <list>, #> #   domain_metadata <list>, column_names <list>, column_labels <list>, #> #   column_datatypes <list>, column_descriptions <list>, permalink <chr>, #> #   link <chr>, license <chr>

title: Explore Socrata Data with Ease
text: Use soc_read() read socrata dataset R. Spatial data read sf object. can even perform complex queries using Socrata Query Language (SoQL) via soc_query().
code: cta_ridership <- soc_read(   "https://data.cityofchicago.org/Transportation/CTA-Ridership-Daily-Boarding-Totals/6iiy-9s97/about_data" ) print(cta_ridership) #> # A tibble: 8,886 × 5 #>    service_date        day_type    bus rail_boardings total_rides #>    <dttm>              <chr>     <dbl>          <dbl>       <dbl> #>  1 2001-01-01 00:00:00 U        297192         126455      423647 #>  2 2001-01-02 00:00:00 W        780827         501952     1282779 #>  3 2001-01-03 00:00:00 W        824923         536432     1361355 #>  4 2001-01-04 00:00:00 W        870021         550011     1420032 #>  5 2001-01-05 00:00:00 W        890426         557917     1448343 #>  6 2001-01-06 00:00:00 A        577401         255356      832757 #>  7 2001-01-07 00:00:00 U        375831         169825      545656 #>  8 2001-01-08 00:00:00 W        985221         590706     1575927 #>  9 2001-01-09 00:00:00 W        978377         599905     1578282 #> 10 2001-01-10 00:00:00 W        984884         602052     1586936 #> # ℹ 8,876 more rows chi_community_areas <- soc_read(   "https://data.cityofchicago.org/Facilities-Geographic-Boundaries/Boundaries-Community-Areas/igwz-8jzy/about_data" ) print(chi_community_areas) #> Simple feature collection with 77 features and 5 fields #> Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON #> Dimension:     XY #> Bounding box:  xmin: -87.94011 ymin: 41.64454 xmax: -87.52414 ymax: 42.02304 #> Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84 #> # A tibble: 77 × 6 #>                              the_geom area_numbe community area_num_1 shape_area #>  *                 <MULTIPOLYGON [°]>      <dbl> <chr>     <chr>           <dbl> #>  1 (((-87.65456 41.99817, -87.65574 …          1 ROGERS P… 1           51259902. #>  2 (((-87.68465 42.01948, -87.68464 …          2 WEST RID… 2           98429095. #>  3 (((-87.64102 41.9548, -87.644 41.…          3 UPTOWN    3           65095643. #>  4 (((-87.67441 41.9761, -87.6744 41…          4 LINCOLN … 4           71352328. #>  5 (((-87.67336 41.93234, -87.67342 …          5 NORTH CE… 5           57054168. #>  6 (((-87.64102 41.9548, -87.64101 4…          6 LAKE VIEW 6           87214799. #>  7 (((-87.63182 41.93258, -87.63182 …          7 LINCOLN … 7           88316400. #>  8 (((-87.62446 41.91157, -87.62459 …          8 NEAR NOR… 8           76675896. #>  9 (((-87.80676 42.00084, -87.80676 …          9 EDISON P… 9           31636314. #> 10 (((-87.78002 41.99741, -87.78049 …         10 NORWOOD … 10         121959105. #> # ℹ 67 more rows #> # ℹ 1 more variable: shape_len <dbl> lower_west_side <- soc_read(   "https://data.cityofchicago.org/Facilities-Geographic-Boundaries/Boundaries-Community-Areas/igwz-8jzy/about_data",   query = soc_query(     where = "community LIKE 'LOWER WEST SIDE'"   ) ) print(lower_west_side) #> Simple feature collection with 1 feature and 5 fields #> Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON #> Dimension:     XY #> Bounding box:  xmin: -87.68807 ymin: 41.8348 xmax: -87.63516 ymax: 41.86002 #> Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84 #> # A tibble: 1 × 6 #>                    the_geom area_numbe community area_num_1 shape_area shape_len #> *        <MULTIPOLYGON [°]>      <dbl> <chr>     <chr>           <dbl>     <dbl> #> 1 (((-87.63516 41.85772, -…         31 LOWER WE… 31          81550724.    43229.  trips_to_lws_by_ca <- soc_read(   "https://data.cityofchicago.org/Transportation/Taxi-Trips-2013-2023-/wrvz-psew/about_data",   query = soc_query(     select = "pickup_community_area, count(*) as n",     where = glue::glue(       "within_polygon(dropoff_centroid_location, '{sf::st_as_text(lower_west_side$the_geom)}')"     ),     group_by = "pickup_community_area",     order_by = "n DESC"   ) ) print(trips_to_lws_by_ca) #> # A tibble: 78 × 2 #>    pickup_community_area      n #>                    <dbl>  <dbl> #>  1                    32 127474 #>  2                     8 113797 #>  3                    28  90983 #>  4                    31  39509 #>  5                    24  37789 #>  6                    33  22793 #>  7                    76  18006 #>  8                     6  15160 #>  9                    56  14142 #> 10                     7  12191 #> # ℹ 68 more rows

title: Explore Socrata Data with Ease
text: Access dataset’s metadata using soc_metadata(). explore dataset’s metadata using ’s url.
code: cta_ridership_meta <- soc_metadata(cta_ridership) print(cta_ridership_meta) #> ID: 6iiy-9s97 #> Name: CTA - Ridership - Daily Boarding Totals #> Attribution: Chicago Transit Authority #> Owner: CTA #> Provenance: official #> Description: This dataset shows systemwide boardings for both bus and rail #> services provided by CTA, dating back to 2001. Daytypes are as follows: W = #> Weekday, A = Saturday, U = Sunday/Holiday. See attached readme file for #> information on how these numbers are calculated. #> Created: 2011-08-12 15:40:31 #> Data last updated: 2025-06-30 18:44:33 #> Metadata last Updated: 2025-06-30 18:44:32 #> Domain Category: Transportation #> Domain Tags: cta, public transit, and ridership #> Domain fields: #> • Data Owner: Chicago Transit Authority #> Columns: #> # A tibble: 5 × 4 #>   column_name    column_label   column_datatype column_description #>   <chr>          <chr>          <chr>           <chr>              #> 1 service_date   service_date   calendar_date   ""                 #> 2 day_type       day_type       text            ""                 #> 3 bus            bus            number          ""                 #> 4 rail_boardings rail_boardings number          ""                 #> 5 total_rides    total_rides    number          "" #> Permalink: https://data.cityofchicago.org/d/6iiy-9s97 #> Link: #> https://data.cityofchicago.org/Transportation/CTA-Ridership-Daily-Boarding-Totals/6iiy-9s97 #> License: See Terms of Use taxi_trips_meta <- soc_metadata(   "https://data.cityofchicago.org/Transportation/CTA-Ridership-Daily-Boarding-Totals/6iiy-9s97/about_data" ) print(taxi_trips_meta) #> ID: 6iiy-9s97 #> Name: CTA - Ridership - Daily Boarding Totals #> Attribution: Chicago Transit Authority #> Owner: CTA #> Provenance: official #> Description: This dataset shows systemwide boardings for both bus and rail #> services provided by CTA, dating back to 2001. Daytypes are as follows: W = #> Weekday, A = Saturday, U = Sunday/Holiday. See attached readme file for #> information on how these numbers are calculated. #> Created: 2011-08-12 15:40:31 #> Data last updated: 2025-06-30 18:44:33 #> Metadata last Updated: 2025-06-30 18:44:32 #> Domain Category: Transportation #> Domain Tags: cta, public transit, and ridership #> Domain fields: #> • Data Owner: Chicago Transit Authority #> Columns: #> # A tibble: 5 × 4 #>   column_name    column_label   column_datatype column_description #>   <chr>          <chr>          <chr>           <chr>              #> 1 service_date   service_date   calendar_date   ""                 #> 2 day_type       day_type       text            ""                 #> 3 bus            bus            number          ""                 #> 4 rail_boardings rail_boardings number          ""                 #> 5 total_rides    total_rides    number          "" #> Permalink: https://data.cityofchicago.org/d/6iiy-9s97 #> Link: #> https://data.cityofchicago.org/Transportation/CTA-Ridership-Daily-Boarding-Totals/6iiy-9s97 #> License: See Terms of Use

what: Discover datasets and public data assets using the Socrata Discovery API — soc_discover
title: Discover datasets and public data assets using the Socrata Discovery API — soc_discover
text: Provides access Socrata Discovery API, allowing search tens thousands government datasets assets published Socrata platform. Governments levels publish data topics including crime, permits, finance, healthcare, research, performance.

title: Discover datasets and public data assets using the Socrata Discovery API — soc_discover
code: soc_discover(   attribution = NULL,   categories = NULL,   domains = NULL,   ids = NULL,   names = NULL,   only = "dataset",   provenance = NULL,   query = NULL,   tags = NULL,   location = "us",   chunk_size = 10000 )

title: Discover datasets and public data assets using the Socrata Discovery API — soc_discover
text: attribution string; Filter attribution publisher categories character vector; Filter categories. domains character vector; Filter domains. ids character vector; Filter specific asset IDs. names character vector; Filter asset names. character vector; Filter specific asset types. Must one : "chart", "dataset", "filter", "link", "map", "measure", "story", "system_dataset", "visualization". Default "dataset". provenance character vector; Filter provenance. Must one : "official" "community". query character string; Filter using token matching one asset's name, description, category, tags, column names, column fieldnames, column descriptions attribution. tags character vector; Filter tags associated assets. location string; Regional API domain: "us" (default) "eu". chunk_size whole number; Number results per request; used pagination. Default 10,000.

title: Discover datasets and public data assets using the Socrata Discovery API — soc_discover
text: tibble containing metadata discovered asset. Columns include: id Asset identifier (four--four ID). name Asset name. attribution Attribution publisher asset. owner_name Display name asset owner. provenance Provenance asset (official community). description Textual description asset. created Date asset created. data_last_updated Date asset data last updated metadata_last_updated Date asset metadata last updated categories Category labels assigned asset. tags Tags associated asset. domain_category Category label assigned domain. domain_tags Tags applied domain. domain_metadata Metadata associated asset assigned domain. column_names Names asset columns. column_labels Labels asset columns. column_datatypes Datatypes asset columns. column_descriptions Description asset columns. permalink Permanent URL asset can accessed. link Direct asset link. license License associated asset.

title: Discover datasets and public data assets using the Socrata Discovery API — soc_discover
code: if (interactive()) { # Search for crime-related datasets in the Public Safety category   results <- soc_discover(     query = "crime",     categories = c("Public Safety"),     only = "dataset"   ) }

what: List Available Datasets on a Socrata Portal — soc_list
title: List Available Datasets on a Socrata Portal — soc_list
text: Retrieves catalog available datasets Socrata open data portal.

title: List Available Datasets on a Socrata Portal — soc_list
List Available Datasets on a Socrata Portal — soc_list
text: url character string specifying base URL Socrata portal (e.g., "https://data.cityofchicago.org").

title: List Available Datasets on a Socrata Portal — soc_list
text: tibble one row per dataset following columns: id Dataset identifier (four--four ID). name Title dataset. categories Categories associated dataset. keywords Keywords describing dataset. last_updated date last dataset modification. landing_page landing page url dataset. description Brief description dataset's content.

title: Extract Socrata Dataset Metadata — soc_metadata
text: Retrieves metadata attributes tibble returned soc_read() using dataset url, including dataset-level information column-level descriptions.

title: Extract Socrata Dataset Metadata — soc_metadata
text: dataset tibble returned soc_read() url.

title: Extract Socrata Dataset Metadata — soc_metadata
text: object class soc_meta, includes: id Asset identifier (four--four ID). name Asset name. attribution Attribution publisher asset. owner_name Display name asset owner. provenance Provenance asset (official community). description Textual description asset. created Date asset created. data_last_updated Date asset data last updated metadata_last_updated Date asset metadata last updated domain_category Category label assigned domain. domain_tags Tags applied domain. domain_metadata Metadata associated asset assigned domain. columns dataframe following columns: column_name Names asset columns. column_label Labels asset columns. column_datatype Datatypes asset columns. column_description Description asset columns. permalink Permanent URL asset can accessed. link Direct asset link. license License associated asset.

title: Extract Socrata Dataset Metadata — soc_metadata
text: function pulls descriptive metadata dataset's ID, title, attribution, category, creation update timestamps, description, domain-specific fields, field descriptions defined data provider.

title: Extract Socrata Dataset Metadata — soc_metadata
code: if (interactive()) {   url <- "https://data.cityofchicago.org/resource/wrvz-psew.json"   data <- soc_read(url)   metadata <- soc_metadata(data)   print(metadata) }

what: Build a Socrata Query Object — soc_query
title: Build a Socrata Query Object — soc_query
text: Constructs structured representation Socrata Query Language (SOQL) query can used Socrata API endpoints. function execute query; creates object can passed request functions printed inspection.

title: Build a Socrata Query Object — soc_query
code: soc_query(   select = NULL,   where = NULL,   group_by = NULL,   having = NULL,   order_by = NULL,   limit = NULL )

title: Build a Socrata Query Object — soc_query
text: select string; Columns retrieve. string; Filter conditions. group_by string; Fields group . string; Conditions apply grouped records. order_by string; Sort order. limit whole number; maximum number records return.

title: Build a Socrata Query Object — soc_query
text: object class soc_query, prints readable format can used build query URLs.

title: Build a Socrata Query Object — soc_query
code: query <- soc_query(   select = "pickup_community_area, count(*) as n",   where = "dropoff_community_area = 31",   group_by = "pickup_community_area",   order_by = "n DESC" ) print(query) #> SELECT pickup_community_area, count(*) as n #> WHERE dropoff_community_area = 31 #> GROUP BY pickup_community_area #> ORDER BY n DESC  if (interactive()) {   trips_to_lws_by_ca <- soc_read(     "https://data.cityofchicago.org/Transportation/Taxi-Trips-2013-2023-/wrvz-psew/about_data",     query = query   ) }

what: Read a Socrata Dataset into R — soc_read
title: Read a Socrata Dataset into R — soc_read
text: Downloads parses dataset Socrata open data portal URL, returning tibble sf object. Metadata also returned attributes returned object.

title: Read a Socrata Dataset into R — soc_read
Read a Socrata Dataset into R — soc_read
text: url string; URL Socrata dataset (e.g., https://data.cityofchicago.org). query soc_query(); Query parameters specification alias string; Use field alias values. three options: "label": field alias values assigned label attribute field. "replace": field alias values replace existing column names. "drop": field alias values replace existing column names.

title: Read a Socrata Dataset into R — soc_read
text: tibble additional attributes containing dataset metadata. dataset contains single non-nested geospatial field, returned sf object. returned object following attributes: id Asset identifier (four--four ID). name Asset name. attribution Attribution publisher asset. owner_name Display name asset owner. provenance Provenance asset (official community). description Textual description asset. created Date asset created. data_last_updated Date asset data last updated metadata_last_updated Date asset metadata last updated domain_category Category label assigned domain. domain_tags Tags applied domain. domain_metadata Metadata associated asset assigned domain. columns dataframe following columns: column_name Names asset columns. column_label Labels asset columns. column_datatype Datatypes asset columns. column_description Description asset columns. permalink Permanent URL asset can accessed. link Direct asset link. license License associated asset.

title: Read a Socrata Dataset into R — soc_read
code: if (interactive()) {   cta_ridership <- soc_read(     "https://data.cityofchicago.org/Transportation/Speed-Camera-Violations/hhkd-xvj4/about_data"   )   print(cta_ridership)   attr(cta_ridership, "description")    trips_to_lws_by_ca <- soc_read(     "https://data.cityofchicago.org/transportation/taxi-trips-2013-2023-/wrvz-psew/about_data",     query = soc_query(       select = "violation_date, count(*) as n",       where = "dropoff_community_area = 31",       group_by = "pickup_community_area",       order_by = "n DESC"     ),     alias = "replace"   ) }

title: socratadata (development version)
text: Initial CRAN submission.
